Polri: Tim Teknis Teror Novel Baswedan Masih Bekerja
01 Nov 2019, 11:55 by Marlinda Oktavia Erwanti
Jakarta - Polri memastikan Tim Teknis kasus teror penyiraman air keras terhadap Novel Baswedan masih bekerja. Tim Teknis menindaklanjuti temuan yang diklaim signifikan untuk mengungkap kasus Novel.
"Saya juga terus sampaikan tim teknis terus bekerja maksimal sampai saat ini. Sampai detik ini mereka melakukan upaya-upaya maksimal untuk mengungkap kasus ini, peristiwa ini. Ada hal-hal yang sangat signifikan yang sudah kami dapat. Doakan sjaa insyaallah kalau Tuhan ridho, kami akan segera mengungkap kasus ini," kata Kadiv Humas Polri Irjen M Iqbal di kompleks Istana, Jumat (1/11/2019).
Pengungkapan kasus Novel ini ditegaskan Iqbal juga menjadi komitmen Kapolri Jenderal Idham Azis. Idham sebelumnya menyatakan akan meminta Kabareskrim baru--yang akan ditunjuknya--untuk mengungkap kasus teror terhadap Novel.
"Sehingga Pak Kapolri yang baru kemarin sudah sampaikan bahwa akan memerintahkan Kabareskrim yang baru yang segera akan ditunjuk insyaallah beberapa saat lagi, beberapa hari lagi. Kabareskrim yang baru akan diperintahkan untuk segera menuntaskan kasus Novel Baswedan," papar Idham.
Tim teknis yang dulu dibentuk Idham Azis saat menjabat Kabareskrim punya waktu kerja mulai 3 Agustus sampai 31 Oktober 2019. Soal kerja tim teknis ini, Novel Baswedan mendesak agar pelaku teror ke dirinya terungkap.
"Kalau saya sih mau dipublikasi atau tidak yang penting ditangkap, kalau sudah enggak dipublikasi enggak ditangkap mau ngapain," kata Novel kepada wartawan di UNJ, Pulo Gadung, Jakarta Timur, Kamis (31/10).
Novel Baswedan diteror dengan cara disiram air keras pada 11 April 2017 setelah menunaikan salat subuh di Masjid Al-Ihsan, Kelapa Gading, Jakarta Utara.

Polri: Baswedan Novel Terror Technical Team Still Working
Nov 1, 2019, 11:55 by Marlinda Oktavia Erwanti
Jakarta - The National Police ensured that the Technical Team on the hard watering terror case against Baswedan Novels is still working. The Technical Team is following up on findings that are claimed to be significant to uncover novel cases.
"I also continue to convey the technical team continues to work optimally until now. Until this moment they are making maximum efforts to uncover this case, this event. There are very significant things that we have got. Pray for God willing, God willing, we will soon uncover this case, "said the Head of Public Relations of the National Police Inspector General M Iqbal in the Palace complex, Friday (11/01/2019).
Disclosure of the novel case Iqbal stressed was also a commitment of the National Police Chief General Idham Azis. Idham had previously said he would ask for a new Kabareskrim - which he would appoint - to uncover terror cases against the Novel.
"So that the Chief of Police only said yesterday that he will order a new Kabareskrim which will soon be appointed in a few moments, a few more days. The new Kabareskrim will be ordered to immediately resolve the Baswedan Novel case," said Idham.
The technical team that was once formed by Idham Azis while serving Kabareskrim had work time from 3 August to 31 October 2019. About the work of this technical team, Novel Baswedan urged that terrorists to himself be revealed.
"If I want to be published or not, what is important is to arrest, if it's not published, what will I do if I don't want to be arrested," Novel told reporters at UNJ, Pulo Gadung, East Jakarta, Thursday (10/31).
The Baswedan novel was terrorized by being doused with hard water on April 11, 2017 after performing dawn prayers at the Al-Ihsan Mosque, Kelapa Gading, North Jakarta.
